about_the_game:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey the atmosphere of the game, leaving your computer's desktop with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Geometric Sniper - Z” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\Geometric Sniper-Z\ Geometric Sniper Z - Wallpapers).

content_descriptors.notes: In this game there will be, shots, blood, zombies and crimes.

name: Geometric Sniper Z - Wallpapers

  • OS: Win 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
